verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Adaba nla ti ko se foju di
We lift you up above all
We bless your name
We glorify you
Oyigiyigi
Iwo logo ye

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Se ni ma rababa rababa fun baba
Se ni ma rababa rababa fun omo
Se ni ma rababa rababa fun emi mimo
Mo wa dupe ore te se laye mi

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Call:- Alagba wi eda mo wa dupe o.
Resp:- Mo dupe, baba o Modupe
